name: tempSensor.C
content:
Converts tempSensor.value to an easy to read temperature in Celsius

[`tempSensor.C`(#f78183)](/docs/applab/tempSensor.C/) is a property of the tempSensor analog object. [`tempSensor.C`(#f78183)](/docs/applab/tempSensor.C/) converts the raw value to Celsius,
short_description: Converts tempSensor.value to an easy to read temperature in Celsius
